title: Episode 188 "Best of The Best Cheers
itunes:title: Episode 188 "Best of The Best Cheers
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. On today's episode we’re celebrating our "Best of The Best Cheers"! We’ve shared some amazing moments, with some incredible people at the DC table. While we have new episodes brewing up in the weeks to come, we want to take some time and relive some of our favorite moments of 2019 with you... the Drink Champs Army!

So take a seat at the table, smell the flowers while you can smell them, grab a drink while you can drink them, smoke some trees while you can inhale them and relax with your favorite Drunk Uncles!

Make Some Noise!!!

Follow:

Drink Champs

http://www.drinkchamps.com

http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

http://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps

http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

DJ EFN

http://www.crazyhood.com

http://www.instagram.com/whoscrazy

http://www.twitter.com/djefn

http://www.facebook.com/crazyhoodproductions

N.O.R.E.

http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga

Boost: Visit BoostMobile.com or your nearest retailer for offer details.

MyBookie: If you join now, MyBookie will match your deposit halfway up to $1,000 at MyBookie.ag with promo code DRINKCHAMPS.

Dollar Shave Club: Get the Ultimate Starter Set for just $5 at DollarShaveClub.com/CHAMPS.
